basebaLLisforme, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have been given this prescription of 150 mg a day for severe anxiety with depression. I have been taking it now for almost a month. I had taken myself off Seroquel XR because it has made me gain about 50 lbs. I went from being under weight to extreme over weight.  I have not lost any weight yet since I have been on thorazine. I'm hoping It will start coming off soon. I'm going to give it another month or so to drop atleast 10 pounds. I will have to try another medication if the weight from the seroquel xr does not come off. It will be a bummer if I have to get off thorazine because it has helped my anxiety and mood a ton!!! Medications effect each and every individual differently. Just don't give up on trying to find one that works for you. I am a firm believer that medicine can help you live a happy productive life. Good luck to everyone out there!

column1: Mental Disorder with Loss of Normal Personality &amp; Reality
column2: Shelly, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: Thorazine has helped curb my incessant thinking, stopped bizarre thoughts and probably saved my life along with Paxil (I once heard a voice telling me to take "all those pills", and I did.) Its one side effect has been sleepiness, which helps me get to sleep at night. I have had trouble doing normal thinking when on a large dosage so I've worked to get my dosage down to a satisfactory level. Now my thinking is clearer and I still have the tranquilizing effect which keeps me sane. I'm wondering now, though, if it is causing me the extreme fatigue I am feeling.

column9: I had psychosis with multiple personalities, nausea, and migraines. This medicine, along with phenytoin (for seizures) helped me to think straight. I can't think like I used to, but at least I am not extremely confused anymore.

column2: sanctify88, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Caregiver)
column9: When I started taking this thorazine Medicine I was only 11 years old.I took it for 6 years because the doctor claimed I was schizophrenic when really I had bad behavior.When I started taking this medicine I was only taking 25 ml per pill at 1 pill every night and then they increased the dosage to 2 a day and then they increased it again and I was up to 4 pills a day.I was in the 7th grade at the time and I was having trouble with work in school because of the dosage and so they lowered the dosage down to 2 a day and that wasn't working either so they lowered it down to one a day and really it made me worse.So in January 2000 I took my last pill and my mom didn't go to get my perscription refilled because she and every one else saw that I did better off of all the depressents so we talked to my psychiatrist and told him that I no longer need it so he took me off of it.So all I can say is if you want my opinion about this medicine or any other medicine !!!!IT DON'T WORK!!!!!!!!
